author: Jennifer A. Kingson
title: The rich pull up the drawbridges to ride out the coronavirus
description: From hastily-chartered superyachts to fortresslike country estates, the wealthiest Americans have found places to ride out the pandemic far away from the masses. Why it matters: The contrast between the rich vs. poor experience of coronavirus exposes class di…
content:
From hastily-chartered superyachts to fortresslike country estates, the wealthiest Americans have found places to ride out the pandemic far away from the masses.
